title: Schindler's List (1993) [Ghost]
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Schindler's List
Year: 1993
IMDb rating: 8.9
Director: Steven Spielberg
Genre: Biography/Drama/History/War
Featuring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes
Description: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: Theatrical Edition, 187 minutes, Dutch retail 2008
Spoken Language: English (partly Hebrew, German and Polish)
Subtitle Language: English (partly Hebrew, German and Polish)
Subtitles were ripped from DVD. Descriptions for the Hearing Impaired were removed.
Final size: 1,39GB (1,33GB video, 56MB audio)


CODECS AND CHANNELS
___________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 720x552
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 998kbps
Encoded with MeGUI with the following settings:
- Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to link the two retail discs together, deinterlace, remove medium noise, auto-crop and convert to YV12.
- Encoding with x264 settings: program --preset placebo --tune film --crf 22.8 --deblock 3:2 --keyint infinite --min-keying 1 --open.gop --gpmin 1 --qpstep 12 --chroma-qp-offset 5 --qcomp 0.5 --rc-lookahead 250 --aq-strength 1.5 --merange 64 --non-deterministic --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: Vorbis Audio
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with aoTuV

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: Retail DVD
Made with Optical Character Recognition using Subtitle Edit, and modified:
- Removed descriptions for the hearing impaired.
- Fixed italics. Foreign texts no longer italic, but narrated text is.
- Slightly abbreviated textual scene descriptions to fit on screen in VLC.
- Coloured textual scene descriptions grey.
